dxf2svg.util
Class Base64Generator

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.util.Base64Generator
public final class Base64Generator
extends java.lang.Object

This is a UU encoder decoder object. It has two modes: encode and decode. In the encode mode it takes data and encodes it into base64 text. In the decode mode it takes UU encoded data and decodes it.

Version:
0.01 - September 9, 2004
Author:
Andrew Nisbet

This is where the actual UUEncoding occurs.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null.
java.io.IOException - if there was a problem reading the unencoded data file.
